context: When facilitating communication: establish clear communication channels and protocols, schedule regular team meetings and check-ins, use appropriate communication tools for different types of messages, document important decisions and discussions, provide regular project updates to stakeholders, encourage open and honest feedback, use visual aids and diagrams for complex concepts, implement proper escalation procedures for issues, ensure all team members have access to relevant information, use asynchronous communication effectively, provide clear agendas for meetings, and follow up on action items and decisions. Best practices: active listening, clear documentation, regular updates, and inclusive communication.
description: Facilitate effective team communication and stakeholder management
